summary: Enthusiastic and creative chemist living in the Netherlands but also willing to relocate. I have expertise in designing and applying homogeneous catalysts supported by detailed mechanistic studies. Excellent skills in organic synthesis and analytical chemistry.    Proven track record of excellent work performance within multicultural and cross-functional teams in Europe and South America. Keen to apply technical and project management skills to an industry role.

[{'company': {'id': 166740, 'name': 'Utrecht University', 'logo': 'https://media.licdn.com/dms/image/C510BAQG6HfmPTdJKXw/company-logo_400_400/0/1519884681258?e=1700697600&v=beta&t=i09IbD7RibJlZYVNrl7o5pIy-Ip7_0I2XZqXZA9kXUI', 'url': 'https://www.linkedin.com/school/universiteit-utrecht/', 'employees': {'start': 5001, 'end': 10000}}, 'date': {'start': {'month': 1, 'day': None, 'year': 2018}, 'end': {'month': 3, 'day': None, 'year': 2023}}, 'profile_positions': [{'location': 'Utrecht Area, Netherlands', 'date': {'start': {'month': 1, 'day': None, 'year': 2018}, 'end': {'month': 3, 'day': None, 'year': 2023}}, 'company': 'Utrecht University', 'description': '•	Designed and synthesized nickel phosphine complexes and evaluated their catalytic properties, including condition optimization and substrate scope.
•	Provided key mechanistic information on homogeneous catalyzed reactions by implementing Kinetic Analysis, Structure - Reactivity Analysis, and identifying pre-equilibrium or competing reactions.
•	Led an international collaboration in computational chemistry between Utrecht University and KU Leuven.
•	Two oral presentations at international conferences (NCCC 19 and EuCOMC XXIII). 
•	Conceived and wrote a research proposal leading to an XS Package NWO grant (50,000 €).  
•	Investigated the potential of nickel-based catalysts for biodiesel production via a metathesis process.', 'title': 'Researcher', 'employment_type': 'Full-time'}]}, {'company': {'id': 3211740, 'name': 'Universidad Privada Boliviana - Fundación Educativa', 'logo': 'https://media.licdn.com/dms/image/C4E0BAQGf7L0LNNBesg/company-logo_400_400/0/1519909124494?e=1700697600&v=beta&t=2RFkTSPwtReb6RxIEQwl_vOu0Cso3K1USyJ9qpnWJkw', 'url': 'https://www.linkedin.com/company/universidad-privada-boliviana---fundaci-n-educativa/', 'employees': {'start': 201, 'end': 500}}, 'date': {'start': {'month': 3, 'day': None, 'year': 2016}, 'end': {'month': 8, 'day': None, 'year': 2017}}, 'profile_positions': [{'location': 'Cochabamba - Bolivia', 'date': {'start': {'month': 2, 'day': None, 'year': 2017}, 'end': {'month': 8, 'day': None, 'year': 2017}}, 'company': 'Universidad Privada Boliviana - Fundación Educativa', 'description': '•    Designed and evaluated the process development of the electrochemical oxidation of industrial synthetic dyes by ferrate ion using a small batch reactor. •    Advance training in the following instrumental analysis techniques: NMR, 2D NMR, Gas chromatography, GC-MS, HPLC, IR, and UV-vis.

•    Direct supervisor of two Master projects.
